EmailTemplate.subject: NACS 2021: Find out how NCR can help you add value to your customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> The pandemic has substantially changed the way consumers shop. Contactless payments, self-checkout, and curbside pickup have spiked and are here to stay. Find out how technology trends are shaping the convenience industry at this year's NACS show. Join NCR at NACS in Booth #3967 <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2021]]>. We’ll be showcasing how we help you run the store at lower overall costs and improve the customer experience. - Did you know that virtualizing core store technology can boost your speed of innovation at lower costs helping you to keep up with fast changing technology trends? - Have you thought about how self-checkout can boost customer experience and improve use of staff? Find out how you can leverage the latest NCR innovations in Loyalty, Food Service and Mobile technologies to drive growth! There’s still time to book an appointment with one of our experts. Schedule your meeting now <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2021]]>.
